name: News Nerdery
tagline: An international meta organization to foster news nerd collaboration and knowledge sharing
body:
Hi! Welcome to News Nerdery. We're fostering news nerd collaboration and knowledge sharing in these two ways:

* Synchronous chat using [Slack](https://newsnerdery.slack.com). [Email Daniel](daniel.bachhuber@fusion.net) to signup.
* Knowledge sharing using a [Github docs repo](https://github.com/newsnerdery/docs). [Create an issue](https://github.com/newsnerdery/docs/issues) if you have a question you want answered, or submit a pull request if you have knowledge to contribute.

Feedback welcome! Open up a Github issue, or [tweet @danielbachhuber](https://twitter.com/danielbachhuber).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
